category: Member Sports Organization Regulations/Article 6 (Rights and Obligations for Sports Association)
contents: Article 6 (Rights and Obligations for the Sports Association) ① Member sports organizations have the rights and obligations stipulated in Article 10 of the Sports Association Articles of Incorporation. Revised 2021. 10. 6. ② Among member sports organizations, regular member organizations must pay membership fees pursuant to Article 10, Paragraph 2, Item 3 of the Sports Association Articles of Incorporation at the time determined by the Sports Association Board of Directors. ③ The Sports Association shall report the membership fees paid by member sports organizations to the General Assembly of the Sports Association in accordance with paragraph 2. ④ Member sports organizations must comply with the anti-doping regulations as stipulated in Article 2, Paragraph 4 of the Sports Association’s Articles of Incorporation. Newly established 2021. 10. 6. [Fully revised 2017. 3. 23.]
